Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Government Innovation Fellowship 💻🏛󠁵󠁳󠁭󠁵󠁳󠁴󠁸󠁿

Sep 5, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • world bank
  • code for pakistan
  • kpitb

We are joined by three panelists for this episode, including, Asim Ishaq Khan, Deputy Director of Projects at KPITB, Emcet Oktay Tas, Senior Social Development Specialist at the World Bank, as well as Sheba Najmi, Founder and Executive Director at Code for Pakistan. We’ll be talking about the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Government Innovation Fellowship, which was formed by a partnership of their organizations.
